root.name: Atomix
root.description: OverviewIn this level, level 9, the player must put together C2H6O, commonly known as EthanolIn Atomix it is the player's duty to reunite the fractured pieces of chemicals - known as atoms - in the proper order so that they may once again become the molecules they once were. By moving atoms up/down and left/right, the player must use natural and player-made barriers to guide the flow of these atoms to their rightful place attached to its fellows. With numerous puzzles to choose from, Atomix offers hours of sometimes-frustrating puzzle-solving fun.
